About a year since [President Donald Trump](https://www.thehindu.com/tag/donald-trump/) was sworn into office for his second term, his administration has made progress on one key campaign promise: [downsizing the United States Department of Education (DOE)](https://www.thehindu.com/news/international/us-supreme-court-allows-trump-to-lay-off-nearly-1400-education-department-employees/article69812527.ece), framed as handing back control of education to the States. Over the course of several executive orders and layoffs, the DOE now exists in a slimmer avatar, with functions handed over to other departments as well.
